message.entry: Invalid data type. First argument must be double, single, int8, uint8, int16, uint16, int32, uint32, or logical.
Invalid data type. Second argument must be double, single, int8, uint8, int16, uint16, int32, uint32, or logical.
Second argument must be a vector.
First argument must be a vector.
Maximum lag must be a scalar.
Maximum lag must be an integer.
Scale option must be ''none'' for input vectors of different lengths.
For code generation, the dimension to operate along must not change. When {0} is a vector input, consider passing in {0}(:) or {0}(:).' instead.
